issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h3. Steps to Reproduce
Open an old project made in previous appcelerator studio. Select a view file. Switch to XML tab. Observe possible design values changed, as well as an unstaged changes which results in the entire file to git repository.

h3. Actual Result
Alerts git of unstaged changes of entire file.

h3. Expected Result
No change and no unstaged changes in git.
fields.summary: Selecting XML tab from Design tab on an old project presents unstaged changes to entire file

comments.body:
Hello [~g4be],

Thanks for reporting. We really appreciate your contribution.
From the log it is seen that you are using Appcelerator Studio {{4.7.0.201605030717}}. This version is not yet released but actually in development. It is recommended that you use latest stable version which is {{4.5.0.201602170821}}.

Thanks
These are updates that the studio prompts me with, are you saying that I have to deal with constant update prompts that are breaking my environment? Why am I being alerted to beta versions?

Hello, 

Try running the below command 

appc use latest
appc setup

If your installation process is successful. This should relieve you from constant update prompt. Also, you should make sure you have the latest studio version that is in this link https://web.appcelerator.com/product/studio

Regards,
Sharif.
